title: How Air Pollution Threatens Natural Pest Control Methods in Sustainable Farming

tasks.task: How air pollution threatens natural pest control methods in sustainable farming
subtasks: Understand the dangers of air pollution to humans and the environment
Recognize the sources of air pollution (industrial manufacturing, car emissions, power plants)
Identify the effects of air pollution on the natural ecosystem (disruption of migratory patterns, affecting habitats)
Examine the impact of air pollution on organic farming (stunted plant health, reduced yields, increased pest susceptibility)
Discuss the vulnerability of organic pest control techniques (e.g., ladybugs struggling to find food or reproduce)
Highlight the role of sustainable agriculture in food security and environmental preservation

tasks.task: Subscribe to the channel for more similar content
subtasks: Encourage viewers to subscribe for future videos
